datasets.name: bde2a186
datasets.query:
-- Table Entities

WITH all_Table_details AS (
        SELECT t.*,
        MAX(tl_reads.event_time) AS latest_read_timestamp,
        max_by(tl_reads.created_by, tl_reads.event_time) AS last_user_read_by
        FROM system.information_schema.tables t
        LEFT JOIN system.access.table_lineage AS tl_reads ON (
        CONCAT(t.table_catalog, '.', t.table_schema, '.', t.table_name) = tl_reads.source_table_full_name
        AND source_type = 'TABLE'
        )
        GROUP BY ALL
),

parsed_table_tags AS (
SELECT *
FROM system.information_schema.table_tags t 
WHERE (:tag_name_csv = 'all')
OR (lower(t.tag_name) IN (SELECT value 
                        FROM LATERAL VIEW explode(split(lower(:tag_name_csv), ',')) AS value))
),

core_tables AS (
SELECT
*,
date_diff(current_timestamp(),last_altered) AS days_since_last_alter,
date_diff(current_timestamp(), latest_read_timestamp) AS days_since_last_read,
date_diff(current_timestamp(), created) AS days_since_creation,
CASE WHEN days_since_last_alter > :table_days_alerted_threshold::integer THEN 'STALE - WRITES' ELSE 'FINE' END AS is_stale_writes_flag,
CASE WHEN days_since_last_read > :table_days_read_threshold::integer THEN 'STALE - READS' ELSE 'FINE' END AS is_stale_reads_flag
FROM all_table_details
WHERE table_catalog NOT IN ('__databricks_internal', 'system', 'samples')
AND table_schema NOT IN ('__dlt_materialization_schema', 'information_schema')
),

clean_table_tags AS (
SELECT 
* ,
-- Table Level Tags
        (SELECT COALESCE(collect_set(tag_name), ARRAY()) FROM parsed_table_tags tt
        WHERE tt.catalog_name = tp.table_catalog
        AND tt.schema_name = tp.table_schema
        AND tt.table_name = tp.table_name
        ) AS table_level_tags
FROM core_tables tp
)

SELECT * 
FROM clean_table_tags
WHERE 
1=1 
AND (:tag_name_csv = 'all'
OR size(table_level_tags) > 0
-- OR size(column_level_tags) > 0
-- OR size(schema_level_tags) > 0
-- OR size(catalog_level_tags) > 0
)

datasets.name: fb9006d6
datasets.query:
-- Table Entities

WITH all_Table_details AS (
        SELECT t.*,
        MAX(tl_reads.event_time) AS latest_read_timestamp,
        max_by(tl_reads.created_by, tl_reads.event_time) AS last_user_read_by
        FROM system.information_schema.tables t
        LEFT JOIN system.access.table_lineage AS tl_reads ON (
        CONCAT(t.table_catalog, '.', t.table_schema, '.', t.table_name) = tl_reads.source_table_full_name
        AND source_type = 'TABLE'
        )
        GROUP BY ALL
),

parsed_table_tags AS (
SELECT *
FROM system.information_schema.table_tags t 
WHERE (:tag_name_csv = 'all')
OR (lower(t.tag_name) IN (SELECT value 
                        FROM LATERAL VIEW explode(split(lower(:tag_name_csv), ',')) AS value))
),

core_tables AS (
SELECT
*,
date_diff(current_timestamp(),last_altered) AS days_since_last_alter,
date_diff(current_timestamp(), latest_read_timestamp) AS days_since_last_read,
date_diff(current_timestamp(), created) AS days_since_creation,
CASE WHEN days_since_last_alter > :table_days_alerted_threshold::integer THEN 'STALE - WRITES' ELSE 'FINE' END AS is_stale_writes_flag,
CASE WHEN days_since_last_read > :table_days_read_threshold::integer THEN 'STALE - READS' ELSE 'FINE' END AS is_stale_reads_flag
FROM all_table_details
WHERE table_catalog NOT IN ('__databricks_internal', 'system', 'samples')
AND table_schema NOT IN ('__dlt_materialization_schema', 'information_schema')
),

clean_table_tags AS (
SELECT 
* ,
-- Table Level Tags
        (SELECT COALESCE(collect_set(tag_name), ARRAY()) FROM parsed_table_tags tt
        WHERE tt.catalog_name = tp.table_catalog
        AND tt.schema_name = tp.table_schema
        AND tt.table_name = tp.table_name
        ) AS table_level_tags
FROM core_tables tp
),

filtered_tables AS (

SELECT * 
FROM clean_table_tags
WHERE 
1=1 
AND (:tag_name_csv = 'all'
OR size(table_level_tags) > 0
-- OR size(column_level_tags) > 0
-- OR size(schema_level_tags) > 0
-- OR size(catalog_level_tags) > 0
)
),

access_history AS (
        SELECT
source_table_full_name AS read_table_name,
target_table_full_name AS write_table_name,
 SUM(CASE WHEN source_table_name IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS IsRead,
 SUM(CASE WHEN target_table_name IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS IsWrite,
 entity_type,
 created_by AS user_entity,
 source_type,
 target_type,
 COUNT(distinct event_time) as access_count,
 MIN(event_date) as first_access_date,
 MAX(event_date) as last_access_date
FROM
 system.access.table_lineage
 WHERE 
 (source_type = 'TABLE' OR target_type = 'TABLE')
 AND created_by IS NOT NULL
 AND event_date BETWEEN :time_range.min AND :time_range.max
GROUP BY
 ALL
ORDER BY access_count DESC
)

SELECT 
ah.*,
ft.table_catalog AS filter_catalog,
ft.table_schema AS filter_schema,
ft.table_name AS filter_table,
ft.table_owner AS filter_owner,
ft.is_stale_writes_flag,
ft.is_stale_reads_flag
FROM access_history ah
INNER JOIN filtered_tables ft
        ON CONCAT(table_catalog, '.', table_schema, '.', table_name) = ah.read_table_name
        OR CONCAT(table_catalog, '.', table_schema, '.', table_name) = ah.write_table_name

widget.name: 430972fe
widget.textbox_spec:
# Table Access Advisor Dashboard

This advisor aims to show health and statistics of your tables across your system in Unity Catalog. It helps define metrics such as :
1. Read / Write frequency / staleness
2. Access Patterns - "Who accessed what"

frame.title: Read Access Patterns By Table & User
Write Access Patterns By Table & User
Access History Detail
frame.description: Access (read and write) History for all UC tables
